MSG_1.message: 真的要离开这里去做那些无聊的事情吗?

MSG_10.message: Please choose {no} to waste a few more productive hours. Please?

MSG_11.message: Explorers don't quit, but go ahead and click {yes} if you aren't one.

MSG_12.message: Choose {no} If you are a tough bounty hunter, if not, click {yes} daintily.

MSG_13.description: "Seeing" as in having an affair / being unfaithful
MSG_13.message: We never talk anymore. Are you seeing someone else?

MSG_14.message: Do you really have something better to do?

MSG_16.description: A little homage to the movie 2001 A Space Odyssey
MSG_16.message: Just what do you think you're doing, Dave?

MSG_17.description: WIMP could mean Weakly Interacting Massive Particle, good luck translating that! Just go with the other meaning of the word, or make something else up, e.g."Magellan didn't quit".

MSG_2.message: 现在别走, 外面有好多海盗等着你呢.

MSG_3.message: 确定要退出这个好玩又不花你一分钱的游戏吗?

MSG_4.message: 就这么匆匆忙忙地走了吗?

MSG_5.message: 想要战争和荣耀就[留下], 想要工作和烦恼就[离开].

MSG_6.message: 勇敢地[留下]或是怯懦地[离开].

MSG_7.description: Doom 1 anyone? Although it said DOS instead of Command line
MSG_7.message: 如果我是你我就不会这么做, 回去敲代码比玩游戏惨多了.

MSG_8.message: 你会选择[留下]然后继续玩. 照着做吧.

MSG_9.message: 选择[离开]意味着你就得回到乏味的工作中去了.
